鄾字的基本解释

鄾
yōu
古地名，在今中国湖北省襄樊市北。
姓。

鄾字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yōu］
［《廣韻》於求切，平尤，影。］
古地名。春秋邓地，后并于楚。在今湖北省襄樊市北，河南省邓州市。

鄾字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【邑字部】　鄾； 康熙笔画：22； 页码：页1279第15
【等韻】烏求切，音憂。鄧國地。【左傳·桓九年】鄧南鄙鄾人攻而奪之幣。【註】在今鄧縣。又【哀十八年】巴人伐楚，圍鄾。蓋楚已滅鄧，而鄾遂爲楚有耳，其實非有二地也。

鄾字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
鄾字的起名意思

暂无。

鄾
Basic explanation of words
鄾
yōu
Ancient place names are in the north of Xiangfan City, Hubei Province, China.
name.
鄾
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yōu］
["Guangyun" Yu Qiuqi, Pingyou, Ying. ]
Ancient place names. In the Spring and Autumn Period, Deng Di, and later merged with Chu. In the north of Xiangfan City, Hubei Province, Dengzhou City, Henan Province.
鄾
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 2] [Yi Zi Department] 　鄾; Kangxi strokes: 22; Page number: page 1279 15
[Waiting rhyme] Wu Qiuqie, sound worried. Deng Guodi. [Zuo Zhuan · Huan Nine Years] Deng Nan contemptuously attacked and seized the coin. [Note] In today's Deng County. Also 【Eighteen Years of Amour】The Ba people attacked Chu and encircled them. Ge Chu has already destroyed Deng, and Chu has ears. In fact, there are two places.
